title: Mr. Lamamra receives the Secretary of State for Political Affairs at the Croatian Ministry of Foreign Affairs
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Mr. Ramtane Lamamra received, Tuesday, the Secretary of State for Political Affairs at the Croatian Ministry of Foreign and European Affairs of the Republic of Croatia, Frano Matusic, who handed him a message from his counterpart, Gordan Grlik Radman.
The discussions between the two sides focused on ways to deepen the political understanding between the two countries and strengthen bilateral cooperation in various sectors.

The two parties also reviewed the results of the third session of political consultations, held earlier in the morning at the headquarters of the Ministry under the joint chairmanship of the Secretary General (SG), Amar Belani, and the Croatian Secretary of State, Frano Matusic.

In this regard, Mr. Lamamra welcomed the dynamics that characterizes the Algerian-Croatian relations and the promising prospects for strengthening the economic dimension in light of the common historical heritage between the two countries.
